    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0030600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0030600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La energía interna del Planeta</string>
            <string language="en">Internal energy of our planet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interne Energie unseres Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie interne de notre planète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia interna de nosso planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia interna del nostro pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερική ενέργεια του πλανήτη μας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explicación del origen del calor interno de La Tierra, los movimientos de los continentes, los volcanes y terremotos. También trata la formación de las rocas magmáticas y metamórficas.</string>
            <string language="en">Explanation of the origin of earth's internal heat, the movement of the continents, volcanoes and earthquakes. It also deals with the formation of magmatic and metamorphic rocks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklärung des Ursprung der internen Hitze der 
Masse, der Bewegung der Kontinente, der Vulkane und der Erdbeben. 
Sie beschäftigt auch die Anordnung der magmatic und metamorphen
Felsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explication d'origine de la chaleur interne de la 
terre, du mouvement des continents, des volcans et des tremblements de
terre. Elle traite également la formation des roches 
magmatiques et métamorphiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explanação da origem do calor interno da terra, 
do movimento dos continentes, de vulcões e de terremotos. Trata
também da formação de rochas magmatic e metamorphic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione dell'origine di calore interno della 
terra, del movimento dei continenti, dei vulcani e dei terremoti. 
Egualmente si occupa della formazione delle roccie magmatic e 
metamorfiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξήγηση προέλευσης της γήινης εσωτερικής θερμότητας, 
η μετακίνηση των ηπείρων, των ηφαιστείων και των σεισμών. 
Εξετάζει επίσης το σχηματισμό των μαγματικών και 
μεταμορφικών βράχων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
